analysis.functional_summary: This JCL script is designed to compile and link-edit a BMS map named BNK1TFM. It utilizes a predefined procedure MAPGEN and specifies the member BNK1TFM with a relocation mode of ANY. The output is directed to a specified location or system.

return_values: Success or failure of the compile and link-edit process

data_flow: Step 1: Include default settings from DEFAULT member
Step 2: Execute MAPGEN procedure with specified parameters
Step 3: Output the compiled and link-edited map
state_changes: Creation or update of compiled BMS map file
side_effects: File I/O operations for reading JCLLIB and writing output
performance_characteristics: Dependent on the efficiency of the MAPGEN procedure
error_handling: Standard JCL error handling for job execution
modernization_notes: Consider refactoring JCL to a more modern build system
Evaluate the use of modern CI/CD pipelines for automation
analysis.analysis_notes: The JCL script is straightforward, primarily serving as a wrapper to execute the MAPGEN procedure with specific parameters. The complexity is low due to the limited functionality and reliance on external procedures.
